input.sentences: i really love small boats too .
so | piloting a boat was a big deal for me .
output.sentences: Dan loved boats, the history of boats piqued his interest even at a young age.
He didn't care what kind of boat it was, he just loved it.
There were so many beautiful boats to learn about and experience.
Just being on the dock was a lovely experience for him.
Finally, he owned his own boat and was very happy.
